title: owncloud share public link
body:
hi guys,

i'm currently having an issue with sharing a public link for people to access the files outside of the company's local network. by default, owncloud generates the following sharing link:

https://localhost/owncloud/public.php?service=files&t=fef51227e32ef4b7716951f7f2f2932a

i want to replace localhost with either the server name or the ip address so i can provide others with access to the files i want to share. as you can understand, localhost cannot work since the browser of the person who received the link tries to access the location locally.

i have tried to navigate to:

https://local ip/owncloud/

or

https://server name/owncloud/

and the application works fine (you can login and upload files) but the email function doesn't work, where you send the public link to someone else.

i get the following error:

invalid address: sharing-noreply@server name

p.s. i used to get that error with localhost as well, but it was fixed when i added the following settings in the config.php:

'mail_smtpmode' => 'smtp',
'mail_smtphost' => 'mail server',
'mail_smtpauth' => false,
'mail_smtpname' => 'mail account',
'mail_smtppassword' => ''

please briefly explain how to achieve that.

thank you in advance.

kind regards,

croussou
